channel.title: This is what I do
channel.description: Ok, so i know about SCAR and Aryan. I can't ever find good script's for Scar though, and I don't really want to pay for them, so I use Aryan (mopar the autoupdater rules!) the only thing that I'm scared about is getting banned, so I'd like to be able to use SCAR too, when I actually need to auto, because I basically just let Aryan run for a little bit while I'm at teh computer so I can still look around the web ext....can someone help me here? or tell me if this is a good idea or not...thakns!

item.title: This is what I do
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

where could i get this? Link please?

Well you could click on the SCAR Tutorials section and find mine because I don't think there's even a whole page, but here's the link. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,731.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: This is what I do
item.dc:creator: @yeha_x_d yeha x d
item.description:
@yeha_x_d wrote:

i didnt mean over the weekend...i meant if you use it over a long period of time...and unless the scar script was training herblore or prayer it wouldnt take that long to get to lv70....no i meant about using it indefinetly....one day the script will stuff up just a bit and then your character will get lost (and maybe banned).

One time I was power mining in rimmington (before the update there) and when i came to him he was in edgeville with the most random collection of items in his inventory i had ever seen (offtopic sorry).

99% of the time they work great but just sometimes it can go wrong

Read full topic

item.title: This is what I do
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Er... no you won't. I've gotten numerous accounts in the past up to level 70+ using SCAR, no bans yet. Aryan - different story. I have at present 4 accounts that have survived, out of about 30 total created.

Read full topic

item.title: This is what I do
item.dc:creator: @yeha_x_d yeha x d
item.description:
@yeha_x_d wrote:

when you said your scared of getting banned...your not using these programs on your main account right?...because you WILL get banned evenually if you keep using them (even SCAR)

Read full topic

item.title: This is what I do
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

moparisthebest:

also a great place soley devoted to SCAR is www.villavu.com/forums/

Hmmm, thank's alot mate. I've been very curious about it, I used to try and use it, but never got it to function the 110% I needed, I'll check that out. [br][size=1]Posted at: April 21, 2006, 02:53:05 pm[/size][hr]

Nashiu:

Look at my tutorial, people say it's easy to learn it when they read mine.

where could i get this? Link please?

Read full topic
